About

So who are we?

SoundCraft is a small team compromised of industry proffesionals. We left our major label jobs and started SoundCraft in 2016. Now we service thousands of independent artists who all share one thing in common. To get their music to sound proffesional and industry standard so that they can compete with the big guys. With our passions for audio engineering we aim to continue growing and servicing the passionate independent artists all around the world.
